fa23d814-07ef-47c9-a9af-b70cf1d5b068: A mercenary undertaking his task with cold, professional detachment, the assassin is equally adept at espionage, bounty hunting, and terrorism. At his core, an assassin is an artisan, and his medium is death. Trained in a variety of killing techniques, assassins are among the most feared classes.
b9b864b7-c8dd-4b57-b756-b38942d21a44: Already targeted by this ability today
33c91810-1324-41cf-98b3-7065a466bc9a: An assassin can create copies of himself to distract the enemy. As long as at least one copy is present on the battlefield, the assassin deals sneak attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures. This ability otherwise functions as the mirror image {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. The assassin creates one copy plus one copy for every 3 levels the assassin has beyond 3rd. He can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier.
651e936c-05ef-424b-8106-27b0127c0307:
An assassin can make a special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a melee weapon against a target that doesn't know about the assassin. The attack has the additional effect of possibly either paralyzing or killing the target (assassin's choice). Death attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. The death attack fails if the target detects the assassin or recognizes the assassin as an enemy. If the victim of such a death attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + the assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} + the assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier) against the kill effect, they die. If the saving throw fails against the paralysis effect, the victim is rendered {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g} and unable to act for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} plus 1 round per level of the assassin. If the victim's saving throw succeeds, the attack is just a normal attack.
At 10th level, the death attack becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
1bbf0945-1887-401d-96b6-0fccfa38a730: An assassin can study his target before delivering the killing blow. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the assassin marks the creature for death. As long as a creature is affected by mark of death, the assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against it ignore its {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} and resistances. An assassin can only have one target marked at a time.
3de3e915-8f81-42f4-8f5f-a7ef2a037c34: An assassin is a soulless, emotionless killing machine. He gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting, compulsion, fear, and emotion effects. At 5th and 8th levels, this bonus increases by 1.
8214a3fe-8fa0-49df-8e20-f8d2cbcb0c4e: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}, an assassin can make a special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against the target affected by his mark of death. The target must not be able to see the assassin. The assassin attempts to aim for the target's weakest point, which greatly complicates his task and applies a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the attack. If the attack hits, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + the assassin's level + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier). On a failed save, the target instantly dies. On success, the assassin's attack is treated as a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} (the assassin still has to confirm the critical hit). The target is also hit with the realization that it just had a brush with death and becomes {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Regardless of whether or not the save is made, the target is immune to the assassin's target assassination ability for 24 hours.
ae966ad8-a805-48b0-8339-481221b2e1c0: Assassins are proficient with the crossbow, dagger, rapier, shortbow, and shortsword. Assassins are proficient with light armor but not with shields.
021a2924-0ff0-4996-a9e6-5389c214aeb6:
Assassins specialize in poison use. Each day, they can create 6 + assassin level ×2 doses of special combat poisons, which they can use to envenom their melee weapons. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, an assassin can apply one of the poisons to his melee weapon, and the next successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} applies it to the target. The {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the assassin's poisons is 10 + his assassin level + his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier. If the attack that applies the poison is a sneak attack, the DC is increased by 2. If the target is affected by the assassin's mark of death ability, it must make two saving throws against his poisons and take the worse result.
At 2nd level, the assassin gains access to poisons that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}stat damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} for 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
At 3rd level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 4th level, the assassin gains access to a poison that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} damage.
At 5th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the assassin's poisons increases to 2.
At 6th level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 7th level, the assassin can apply his poisons as a move or a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
At 8th level, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 round.
At 9th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the assassin's poisons increases to 3.
At 10th level, the target of the assassin's poison takes one round of ability damage from the poison on a successful Fortitude save.
1bf8dd09-e590-4b42-9b00-de048b288986: At 10th level, the target of the assassin's poison takes one round of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} from the poison on a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}.
b3897d7a-ff74-4d74-be69-9c63f76c8723: At 2nd level, the assassin gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against poisons. This bonus increases by +1 every two levels.
2a8b632a-2796-4c2d-bafc-f886a3fb0864: At 3rd, 6th, and 8th levels, the duration of the assassin's poisons increases by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5005ee77-50d1-48c6-9cf5-186b6cfbe12f: At 4th level, an assassin gains access to poison that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}.
edc673c8-66b5-43dc-9921-4f96d3e36830: At 5th and 9th levels, the number of successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} needed to remove the assassin's poisons increases by 1 (to a maximum of 3 at 9th level).
4db45cee-82d8-4e1b-be74-3b75807e76c2: At 5th level, an assassin can use the {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} even while being observed. An assassin can hide himself from view in the open without having anything to actually hide behind.
bda4d596-5ecc-4922-be0f-242df601fa3a: At 7th level, an assassin can apply the poisons as a move or a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
1ae63ffd-281b-42a2-8f0f-870392ae617d: At 7th level, an assassin can use mark of death as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
c5c0a20b-9eb6-4593-ad85-d0b5ca41ff66: Poison Use — Increased Successful Saves to Remove
54cfef1d-644d-46a6-a735-fef35fcd0dd7: The assassin has perfected his craft to a point where he can deliver the killing blow before his target can react. He can now use his target assassination ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. The assassin also adds sneak attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} whenever he hits the target affected by his mark of death, even if the target is not outnumbered or {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}.
47af5e41-7d49-41db-bcbf-cfba99296a45: The assassin's art of killing shocks those around him, making them feel the fear of imminent death. Whenever the assassin reduces a target to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} or kills it with his target assassination ability, he immediately makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see the kill. If the victim was affected by the assassin's mark of death, the assassin gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this check.
